channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain under railway bridge is blocked again, 2nd December
item.description:
The drain under the railway bridge. When it rained last Friday the water cooled again. It still hasn't completely gone and it hasn't rained for over 24 hours now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole at location of previous repair, 2nd December
item.description:
Travelling TOWARDS cleeve - there is an obvious repair which has failed. It is now REALLY BIG and a DEEP hole - needs an emergency repair in my opinion
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This drain and others on Malvern Road are always blocked, 2nd December
item.description:
This drain is not taking any water during rainfall and others on Malvern Road are the same. it is an ongoing issue that contributes to the flooding on Gloucester Road by Brickfield Drive as the flow goes past the drains on Malvern Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road has been resurfaced but water is not draining away as effectively as it was before. If there is a freeze overnight after rain it will become very dangerous, 2nd December
item.description:
The problem is on the newly resurfaced area - drainage is not working well especially on the bend by Upper Farm. It was extremely bad today after overnight rain but luckily it has not frozen. But this could be a future risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
